'''''Mythlore'' 75''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol20/iss1/ Volume 20, Issue 1]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

* McQuade, Brett T. "''Peter Pan'': Disney’s Adaptation of J.M. Barrie’s Original Work."
* Beach, Sarah. "Breaking the Pattern: Alan Garner's ''The Owl Service'' and the ''Mabinogion''."
* Callahan, Tim. "Censoring the World Riddle."
* Thompson, Ricky L. "Tolkien’s Word-Hord Onlēac."
* Hruschka, John. "Anne Sexton and Anima Transformations: Transformations as a Critique of the Psychology of Love in ''Grimm’s Fairy Tales.''"
* Stewig, John Warren. "The Witch Woman: A Recurring Motif in Recent Fantasy Writing for Young Readers."

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen. Editorial Introduction: 75 in 25.
* Kondratiev, Alexei. “Tales Newly Told.”
* Letters.
* Wynne, Patrick, Paula DiSante, and Sarah Beach. “Artists' Comments.”

====Reviews====

* ''The 1994 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar.'' Illustrated by Michael Kaluta. Reviewed by Paula DiSante.
* ''Spiritual Writings''. Dorothy L. Sayers. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''Dorothy L. Sayers: The Centenary Celebration''. Alzina Stone Dale, editor. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
